about_the_game:
The Savvy Investor Bundle contains 115 Gold Bars, and the illustrious Blue Suede Suit! Enjoy this discounted bundle containing a big whack of Gold Bars, and the ever-popular Blue Suede Suit, which, when equipped, awards a profit boost to ALL investments on Earth. You're already well on your way to fiscal domination and becoming the leader of the free world, so it's time to look the part while doing it!

The DLC will be automatically downloaded to your game the next time you launch, AdVenture Capitalist!
detailed_description:
The Savvy Investor Bundle contains 115 Gold Bars, and the illustrious Blue Suede Suit! Enjoy this discounted bundle containing a big whack of Gold Bars, and the ever-popular Blue Suede Suit, which, when equipped, awards a profit boost to ALL investments on Earth. You're already well on your way to fiscal domination and becoming the leader of the free world, so it's time to look the part while doing it!

The DLC will be automatically downloaded to your game the next time you launch, AdVenture Capitalist!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10+, Mint 17.1+
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 32- and 64-bit both supported

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
